website_summaries.verdict: This supplement provides 600 mg of calcium and 400 IU of vitamin D3 per serving.
pros: Contains a rich combination of calcium and vitamin D3 to help users build and maintain healthy bones and teeth
Does not include any artificial flavors, preservatives or yeast
Convenient tablets can be consumed once or twice daily for optimal results
cons: Tablets are gritty and hard, and they may be difficult for some users to swallow

customer_reviews.title: quit calcium supplements
customer_reviews.text: I got nervous about taking this in supplement form and quit taking them. After my CT scan of my heart showed my LAD artery getting calcified. Score of 100. I am using milk, ice cream , cheese for calcium and some vitamin K2. There are studies as well showing how calcium sup is not good. Someday I'll go back to that hospital and get another CT scan to see how my arteries are doing.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Anti Freeze
customer_reviews.text: Hello One thing to say. Contains ANTI FREEZE! Propylene Glycol! I will not use this product anymore. There are many supplements that do not contain Anti-freeze. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have to take extra calcium and these are the only ones I’ve found that are easy to swallow. There half the size of other brands I’ve tried. They also don’t leave a funky taste in your mouth. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not chalky!!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally using Nature Made’s softgel version of this vitamin, but I wanted to try something different after those vitamins kept losing their firmness after I had them in my weekly pillbox for a day or two. I was hesitant to try these as I was afraid they would be powdery and taste bad, but they’ve been great! They’re a little harder to swallow than the softgels because they aren’t as smooth, but they don’t leave a bad taste in your mouth and aren’t powdery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B.

customer_reviews.title: Good reputation
customer_reviews.text: Nature Made supposedly have quality products that are certified for strength and purity. After using store brands, I decided to give these a go. Who knows if they really work any differently? Calcium tablets are generally large and sometimes difficult to swallow. This seem just a bit smaller and go down well. My doctor advised a supplement to avoid osteoporosis. I plan to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: they work!
customer_reviews.text: these work great ! since taking them, i sleep better, my back pain has went away, and surprisingly i have more energy, that fatigue i’ve been experiencing may have been from a vitamin d deficiency. this has cleared up my deficiency in both areas. will continue to use, but i lowered my dosage from two tabs a day to just one, too much calcium can do you harm, and considering i get a small dose from my multivitamins already and a fair amount from my diet, one tab is all the insurance i need to fill the gap.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stand that so many vitamins add in red dye 40. It makes me itch and my gi system doesn’t appreciate it either. These are some off yellowish color... maybe there’s color added. They’re as much Ca and D as in my CVS pills, but not as large or as red. Much appreciated. If only the vitamin industry were regulated so I actually knew there was Ca and D in there....
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I take this for my old bones, but I've noticed it also helps my hair and nails. It's a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love Nature Made supplements, however...
customer_reviews.text: My doctor put me on a calcium/vitamin D supplement recently after a bone scan indicating I have osteopenia. At 76, I’m just glad it’s not full blown osteoporosis. I tried these for a couple weeks and they make me unbearably constipated and upset my stomach. I took them with food, one in the morning and one at night. I was so hoping I could continue using them but the side effects were just too much.
customer_reviews.author: High 5

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived without the security seal / tamper proof protection and is therefore unusable. Check your bottles before delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with this brand.  Great product.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really tested them out. Easy to swallow. Better sleep now. More for your money. Better than the drug store brand. Perfect addition to my collection of needed vitamins. I ordered 2 more after I fell in love to make sure I always have available. Tale to make magnesium work correctly. Improved mood. Better than gnc. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.title: NatureMade Calcium
customer_reviews.text: NatureMade is a really great brand. Sometimes though when you're searching for gummies and not tablets, it should come up with gummies. This is my fault too I should have read more carefully. Thank you though for getting my vitamins here nicely promptly and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: but amazon provided better pricing. Product arrived as described and very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Big fan on this product. Found it in store through at a well known sports nutrition company, but amazon provided better pricing. Product arrived as described and very quickly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scully

customer_reviews.title: Finally a calcium I can swallow!
customer_reviews.text: These calcium pills are not too long or wide, They are actually about as tall as a penny, as shown in the description. I'm very happy with them because they are smooth and easy to swallow. It's a real relief to have calcium that doesn't make me feel like I'm swallowing a small rock.
customer_reviews.author: Hil M.

customer_reviews.title: No USP seal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these believing that they had the USP seal, as other Nature Made products do, but the symbol is missing, which must mean that they're not certified by the USP.
customer_reviews.author: S. LaCour

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dose since it is recommended to take 500 mg ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dose since it is recommended to take 500 mg twice a day without other vitamins. Several other vitamins and minerals block calcium, so it should be taken alone with a little food. No after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These calcium supplements are affordable and high quality. Easy to swallow. I take it at the same time as my multivitamin and vitamin C supplement and have no trouble swallowing all three at once. Also, they are not overly dusty which is nice. I would recommend this product to those who need to supplement with calcium and vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: J&J Andreason

customer_reviews.title: For those who don't drink a lot of milk
customer_reviews.text: My food intake does not include the mdr of calcium. So, I take supplements. How do you tell if it's beneficial or not?
customer_reviews.author: Gerry O.

customer_reviews.title: angry
customer_reviews.text: It’s too angry. Originally there were 3 bottles in this package. Actually only sent me a bottle, but also calculated the price of 1 package. Unhappy to buy once! Ready to return now
customer_reviews.author: Jinming jiang

customer_reviews.title: Heart palpitations
customer_reviews.text: I took these a few times and noticed my heart would feel like it would miss a beat occasionally after I took these, so I stopped taking them. Did some googling and it seems Calcium supplements can cause heart issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Price is to High!
customer_reviews.text: The pill is fine but the same pill, plus 30 extra pills, can be bought at Walmart for $5.94!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These pills though large, are very easy to break on scored line. The price is very good. I take 1/2 morning and the other at night to spread the dose over the day.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big, but not hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in to supplement to my prenatals...pretty big, but I don't have much trouble swallowing them.

customer_reviews.title: Only Calcium, a bit hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Take note, this is pure Calcium. No Mag or Zinc to aid in digestion. Also, the pills are quite large and a bit difficult to swallow with their dryness and size. It is what it is.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I fractured my ankle a couple of months ago. Taking calcium has help my recovery.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other brands and no bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs to take calcium as she is breastfeeding. These are smaller size than other ones we've tried so they are easier to swallow. There's also no chalky taste. Nature Made seems to be a reputable brand. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Has maltodextrin (basically powdered corn syrup) fillers
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not properly reading the label but anyone with diabetes, doing low carb, or with any medical issues where they need to watch sugars and carbs should avoid this product.

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Nature Made is good trusted brand. I got my blood calcium levels back up where they should be!

customer_reviews.title: Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely value for money and good for health. I took it for my parents as doctor asked that they have low in calcium and after this calcium deficiency has been removed

customer_reviews.text: In 2016 there is no excuse to manufacture a pill this hard to swallow. The pill had started to dissolve on my fifth attempt to swallow it -- NOT a pleasant taste! I finally had to spit it out. This product needs to come with a warning on it.

product_meta.title: Nature Made Calcium 600 mg Tablets with Vitamin D3, 220 Count Value Size (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:220 Count (Pack of 1)Adequate calcium and vitamin D throughout life, as part of a well-balanced diet, may reduce the risk of osteoporosis. Adequate calcium is also important for teens and young adults and post-menopausal women.† In just one tablet, Nature Made Calcium 600 mg with Vitamin D provides 600 mg of calcium and 400IU (10 mcg) of vitamin D3 to help meet your daily need for calcium. Calcium and vitamin D help support strong bones and teeth.† Vitamin D helps improves calcium absorption.† Two tablets provide 1,200 mg of calcium for those with a higher recommended daily allowance, such as adults 50+. Calories per gram: Fat 9•Carbohydrate 4•Protein 4

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains up to a 220-day supply of Nature Made Calcium 600 mg with Vitamin D3 Tablets, 220 tablets per bottle.
Helps support strong bones. Vitamin D helps improve calcium absorption.
Adults, take 1 tablet 1 to 2 times daily with water and a meal.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
